User wants to access VM via ssh key authentication

If a user want to access linux VM in openstack with ssh key.

If this user is not from UTEC 6, he or she has to do two things, supply his ssh public key and notify the admin system(Pengfei, Pierre).

If this user is from UTEC 6, he or she need to go to https://gitlab.in2p3.fr/bioaster/Bioaster_OS_SSH_KEY, commit his public key, and notify the admin system (i.e. Pengfei, Pierre)

Procedure for enable the ssh key authtication in Vm

1. Make sure the vm sshd config accept ssh key as authentication mode.

2. Once the VM is created, add user bioaster and assign sudoers without password.

3. Create user <e.g. pliu> (We use the login convention of AD. First Lettre of given name plus the full familly name). Then Add user public key into authorized key. (A playbook will be available shortly)

4. Contact user to test access
